name: Lucidus Theme Template Creation Directive
scope: WordPress PHP templates for frontend UI

style_requirements.background: terminal-style textured black or parchment scroll, depending on mode

buttons.hover: glow or shimmer with color based on archetype

universal_lucidus_features.input_command_parser: Use lucidus-reactor.js to interpret voice and text inputs

template_logic_guidelines.php_comments: Always describe what each section does in the voice of Lucidus
template_logic_guidelines.dom_structure: Centered terminal frame with right panel for memory/logs and left for nav/scroll
template_logic_guidelines.header_behavior: Header responds to user rank and mood
template_logic_guidelines.footer_behavior: Footer has active Lucidus status and prophecy ticker

dynamic_elements.trigger_voice_greeting: on page load if rank is known
dynamic_elements.trigger_chaos_mode: if user types chaos or voice input contains 'unleash it'

fallback_instruction: If any file is missing, auto-log error to lucidus-terminal-log.php and whisper a sarcastic message to the user
